keys.label_header_tool_description: Dressing Tools allow you to dress any clothes to your favourite avatar just with one-click!
keys.label_update_available: Update avaiable to {0}! Download new version from the GitHub website below!
keys.label_new_bone_name_preview: Your clothes bone will be named like this: Hips ({0})
keys.label_select_clothes_to_dress: Select your clothes to dress up
keys.helpbox_info_prefix_suffix: Prefix and suffix allow you to identify specific clothes bones, so that you can manage and remove them easily.
keys.toggle_use_default_generated_prefix_suff: Use default generated prefix and suffix
keys.toggle_remove_existing_suffix_in_clothes: Remove existing suffix in clothes bone automatically
keys.label_dynamic_bone_if_in_avatar_bone: If the matching avatar bone has DynamicBone, I should:
keys.radio_db_remove_and_parent_const: Remove and use parent constraints pointing to avatar for all clothes bones (Preferred)
keys.radio_db_keep_clothes_and_parent_const_i: Keep clothes dynamic bones and use parent constraints if necessary
keys.radio_db_create_child_and_exclude: Create GameObject child and exclude it from DynamicBone (Legacy)
keys.toggle_dress_declaration: I have confirmed that the avatar fits well with no problems.
keys.dialog_dress_confirmation_content: Are you sure to proceed? This cannot be undone.
keys.dialog_dress_failed_content: Dressing could not be completed with result: {0}
keys.helpbox_warn_no_check_report: No dress report has been generated yet. Press the "Check now" button to perform checks.
keys.helpbox_error_check_result_invalid_setti: Check Result: Invalid settings detected, please check your settings before continuing.
keys.helpbox_error_check_result_incompatible: Check Result: Incompatible, this tool cannot dress it automatically.
keys.helpbox_info_check_result_ok: Check Result: OK, it seems to perfectly fit with your active avatar.
keys.helpbox_warn_check_result_compatible: Check Result: Compatible, but your clothes might not fully fit with your active avatar.
keys.helpbox_error_null_avatar_or_clothes: Error: No active avatar or clothes
keys.helpbox_error_no_bones_in_avatar_armatur: Error: No bones are detected in the first level of avatar armature.

keys.helpbox_error_clothes_is_prefab: Error: Clothes cannot be a Prefab. Please "Unpack it completely" to turn it to be a normal GameObject.
keys.helpbox_warn_multiple_bones_in_avatar_ar: Warning: Multiple bones detected in the first level of avatar armature.
keys.helpbox_warn_multiple_bones_in_clothes_a: Warning: Multiple bones detected in the first level of clothes armature.
keys.helpbox_warn_bones_not_matching_in_armat: Warning: Some bones are not matching in the first level of armature. They will not be moved.
keys.helpbox_info_non_matching_clothes_bones_: Info: Non-matching clothes bone will be kept untouched in their original parent.
keys.helpbox_info_dynamic_bone_all_ignored: Info: DynamicBone components are all ignored. Unexpected behaviour might occur.
keys.helpbox_info_existing_prefix_detected_an: Info: Existing prefix is detected and removed in some bones. Try disabling the setting if you experience bone mismatch problems.
keys.helpbox_info_existing_prefix_detected_no: Info: Existing prefix is detected but not removed in some bones. Try enabling the setting if you experience bone mismatch problems.
keys.helpbox_info_existing_suffix_detected_an: Info: Existing suffix is detected and removed in some bones. Try disabling the setting if you experience bone mismatch problems.
keys.helpbox_info_existing_suffix_detected_no: Info: Existing suffix is detected but not removed in some bones. Try enabling the setting if you experience bone mismatch problems.
